Install RVM to specific user

  • Need to set $HOME environment

``` ruby “mycookbook/myrecipe/recipe/default.rb” package ‘curl’

bash “install rvm” do cwd “/home/vagrant” user ‘vagrant’ environment ‘HOME’ => “/home/vagrant” code «-EOS curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable –ruby EOS

# manual checks # not_if do # File.exists?(“/home/vagrant/.rvm”) # end

# not execute if file exists creates “/home/vagrant/.rvm” end

```
